citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 am and
1:21 pm on 22-AUG-19.
Arrived at facility knocked on front door. Attempted to contact by phone and left a message. Departed facility at
11:45 am. Returned to facility at 1:21 pm. Knock on front door. Attempted to contact by phone left message.
Departed facility at 1:53 pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 am and
1:21 pm on 22-AUG-19.
Arrived at facility knocked on front door.  Attempted to contact by phone and left a message.  Departed facility at
11:45 am.  Returned to facility at 1:21 pm.  Knock on front door.  Attempted to contact by phone left message. 
Departed facility at 1:53 pm.
